text: The Hungary women's national football team represents Hungary in international women's football. The team, controlled by the Hungarian Football Federation. ==History== ==Home stadium== ==Coaching staff== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Position !! Name !! |14 |79 |0.18 |- style="background:#CCFFCC" |10 |style="text-align:left;"|Zsanett Jakabfi |2007–present |13 |23 |0.56 |} ==Managers== * Edina Markó (2014–present) ==Results and fixtures== *Source: Official Hungary match results and fixtures The following is a list of match results in the last 12 months, as well as any future matches that have been scheduled. ===2019=== ===2020=== ==Honours== ==Achievements== ===Women's World Cup record=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center; width:50%;" |- !colspan=9|FIFA Women's World Cup record |- !Year !Result !GP !W !D* !L !GF !GA !GD |- || 1991||colspan="8" rowspan="8" | Did not qualify |- || 1995 |- || 1999 |- || 2003 |- || 2007 |- || 2011 |- || 2015 |- || 2019 |- || 2023||colspan="8" | To be determined |- |Total||0/9||-||-||-||-||-||-||- |} :*Draws include knockout matches decided on penalty kicks. ===Olympic Games record=== ===UEFA Women's Championship record=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" !colspan=9|UEFA Women's Championship record |- !Year !Round !Position !GP !W !D !L !GS !GA |- |1984 |colspan="8"|Did not enter |- | 1987 |colspan="8" rowspan ="2"|Did not qualify |- | 1989 |- | 1991 |colspan="8"|Did not qualify (quarterfinals) |- | 1993 |colspan="8" rowspan ="8"|Did not qualify |- | 1995 |- | 1997 |- | 2001 |- | 2005 |- | 2009 |- | 2013 |- | 2017 |- | 2021 |colspan="8"|TBA |- |Total||0/8||-||-||-||-||-||-||- |} ==See also== *Hungary women's national football team *Hungary women's national football team results *List of Hungary women's international footballers *Hungary women's national under-20 football team *Hungary women's national under-17 football team *Hungary women's national futsal team ==Notes== ==References== ==External links== *Hungary women's national football team – official website at MLSZ *FIFA profile at FIFA national Category:European women's national association football teams
